Interface Storage

All Known Implementing Classes:
MarsStorage
public interface Storage

This interface represents a storage, whose task is to store a set of files and enable reading-writing of them.

Method Summary
 Cell[] read(int pid, int file, int offset, int size)
          Reads size cells from file file starting from offset offset.
 void write(int pid, int file, int offset, Cell[] cells)
          Writes size cells from file file starting from offset offset.
 

Method Detail

read

public Cell[] read(int pid,
                   int file,
                   int offset,
                   int size)
            throws java.lang.SecurityException
Reads size cells from file file starting from offset offset. Returns the cells read in an array. If less cells than requested can be read (end of file), the cell array returned contains these cells. If the file belongs to a different process id, a security exception is thrown.

Parameters:
pid - process id of the process reading the file
file - file identifier
offset - starting position
size - number of cells to be read
Returns:
an array containing the cells that have been read.
java.lang.SecurityException

write

public void write(int pid,
                  int file,
                  int offset,
                  Cell[] cells)
           throws java.lang.SecurityException
Writes size cells from file file starting from offset offset. If the file belongs to a different process id, a security exception is thrown.

Parameters:
pid - process id of the process reading the file
file - file identifier
offset - starting position
cells - the cells to be written
java.lang.SecurityException
